content: ## heading ## this pattern is a made to measure bottom up hat pattern it uses textured stitches like the bobble stitch half_double_crochet in third loop and single_crochet back loop only there are video tutorial links included in the pattern it can be made with or without a folded brim and can be modified to the desired length and width my measurements are included in the pattern for reference but it can easily be modified to your head size i used 250 yards of red heart super saver solids
